survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate wellness programs in promoting employee health and overall well-being.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure frequency of participation.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify the most popular activities.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness programs offered?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness programs offered?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the corporate wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the corporate wellness programs?

questions.question_text: Has participation in the wellness programs positively impacted your overall health and well-being?
answer_options: No, it has had a negative impact
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Measure perceived impact of wellness programs.

answer_options: No, it has had a negative impact
